name: A Feast for Rabbits
description:
A peaceful forest clearing. Two hungry bunnies. The sky is raining FOOD. What will happen?!

by @nickhaskell and @_laurenfox

--

Instructions:

  1. The first to puke wins.
  2. Fill your puke meter by eating food.
  3. Pepto bottles settle your stomach and decrease your puke meter.
  4. Rainbow shrimps make you puke faster!
